title: Market share of Belgian hospitals per municipality of residence of the patient (2017) : Classic hospitalization by age (version française)
description: This data provides the market share of hospitals per municipality of residence of the patient and per age group. The entirety of hospital stays is regarded as a “market” that is divided among the various hospitals. The market share is shown here per municipality of residence of the patient, both per age group and for all age groups together.
publisher: Federal Public Service Public Health, Food Chain Safety and Environment

dataset.title: Market share of Belgian hospitals per municipality of residence of the patient and per age group
dataset.contactPoint: FPS Public Health, Food Chain Safety and Environment, Directorate General of Healthcare, Data and Policy Information Service, Galileelaan 5/01, 1210 Brussels, Belgium
